1.t: By (the angels) sent forth with the commands of God,

2.t: by (the angels) as swift as blowing winds,

3.t: by (the angels) spreading (the words of God) far and wide,

4.t: by (the angels) who make a clear distinction between right and wrong

5.t: and by those who reveal revelations (to the prophets)

6.t: to provide excuses for some and to give warnings to others:

7.t: that whatever with which you have been warned will inevitably come to pass.

8.t: Then the stars will lose their light.

10.t: The mountains will be blown away as dust.

11.t: The Messengers will receive their appointments.

12.t: If one asks, "To which day have such calamitous events been postponed?"

13.t: one will be told,"To the Day of Distinction".

14.t: Would that you knew about the Day of Judgment!

15.t: On that day, woe will be to those who have rejected God's revelations!

16.t: Did We not destroy the ancient people

17.t: and make others settle after them in their land?

18.t: Thus do We deal with the sinful ones.

19.t: On that day, woe upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

20.t: Did We not create you from an insignificant drop of fluid

21.t: and place it in a secure place

23.t: Thus did We Plan and how excellent is Our planning!

24.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected the revelations of God!

25.t: Did We not make the earth as a gathering place

26.t: for the living and the dead,

27.t: place on it high mountains and provide you with fresh water?
27.tr: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw Wa-asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa

28.t: On that Day (of Judgment) woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

29.t: Proceed to that (the Day of Judgment) which you have rejected.
29.tr: Intaliqooo ilaa maa kuntum bihee tukazziboon

30.t: Proceed to that shadow, rising in three columns
30.tr: Intaliqooo ilaa zillin zee salaasi shu'ab

31.t: which neither gives shade nor protects one from the flames.
31.tr: Laa zaleelinw Wa-laa yughnee minal lahab

32.t: The fire will shoot out sparks as big as huge towers

34.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

35.t: On that day they will not be able to speak,

36.t: nor will they be permitted to offer any excuses.

37.t: On that day, woe would be those who have rejected God's revelations!

38.t: That is the Day of Judgment. We will bring you together with all the ancient peoples.

39.t: If you have any plans, use them.

40.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

41.t: The pious ones will rest amid the shade, springs,

42.t: and fruits of the kind which they desire.

43.t: (They will be told), "Eat and drink in good health as a reward for what you have done".
43.tr: Kuloo washraboo haneee-'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

44.t: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

45.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

46.t: (Disbelievers), eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while. You are certainly sinful ones.

47.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

48.t: When they are told to say their prayers, they do not bow down (in prayer).
48.tr: Wa-izaa qeela lahumur ka'oo laa yarka'oon

49.t: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!

50.t: In which word other than the Quran will they believe?
